title: Iaphets first publique perswasion into Sems tents, or, Peters sermon which was the first generall calling of the gentiles preached before Cornelius / expounded in Cambridge by Thomas Taylor, and now published for the further use of the Church of God.
author: Taylor, Thomas. 1576-1632.
publisher: Printed by Cantrell Legge, printer to the Vniversitie of Cambridge, and are to be sold by Raph Mab at the signe of the Angel in Pauls Churchyard,
